features: TRAVEL SIZE SOOTHING MOISTURIZER: Restore essential moisture to dehydrated skin with the Sensitive Skin Herbal Body Moisturizer by Hempz! Our everyday body lotion features a natural Oat Complex, which will calm and soothe skin to leave it soft and smooth.

ENRICHED BODY CREAM: This daily herbal moisturizer features our signature blend of 100% natural, pure Hemp Seed Oil, an ingredient rich in Essential Fatty Acids that provide protein, carbohydrates, nutrients, key minerals and fiber for healthy skin.

NUTRIENT-RICH FORMULA: Our everyday body moisturizer is formulated with Shea Butter, Cocoa Seed Butter, and Mango Seed Butter to soothe, deeply hydrate, and smooth skin. It also has Chamomile and Avocado to fight irritation and replenish skin.

IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Thoughtfully designed to be calming, rich and hydrating, this moisturizer cream will help reduce dryness and soothe sensitive or dehydrated skin. It contains no perfume and no dyes so that it is perfect for men and women.

SAFE SKINCARE: At Hempz, we believe in providing natural products that help you achieve your best, healthiest skin. Our herbal body lotion contains no parabens, gluten. It is 100% vegan, so you can be certain you are using safe products.
body.description: Hydrate and condition your skin with this Sensitive Skin Herbal Body Moisturizer by Hempz! Our exclusive body lotion has been enriched with 100% natural, pure Hemp Seed Oil, one of the best sources of Essential Fatty Acids that provide skin with protein, carbohydrates, nutrients, key minerals, and fiber. Additionally, it features a calming Oatmeal Complex that helps reduce dryness, prevents rough, scaly, or itchy skin, and helps skin feel soft and smooth. Your skin will be gently rejuvenated with this fragrance-free formula so that it is healthy, silky, and naturally beautiful. This daily herbal moisturizer is carefully formulated to provide moisture and nourishment to your entire body. It is blended with rich Shea Butter to help soothe and calm skin, nutrient-rich Cocoa Seed Butter to help deeply moisturize and nourish sensitive skin, and Mango Seed Butter that softens and smooth skins. Plus, this everyday body lotion contains Chamomile Extract, which treats irritants, and Avocado Extract that will improve your skin tone over time when used regularly. Our body moisturizer is designed for all skin types, and its natural extracts and oils help restore essential moisture to dehydrated and sensitive skin with a non-irritating, gentle formula. At Hempz, we believe in providing you with safe skin care products, which is why our body lotion is paraben-free, gluten-free, THC-free, perfume-free, dye-free, and 100% vegan. This hemp extract lotion is perfect for both men and women and helps enhance skin’s moisture barrier - restoring your true, beautiful skin. Product Details: (1) Sensitive Skin Herbal Body Moisturizer Size: 2.25 ounces Perfume Free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely scent and feel!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always liked Hempz products and this is no exception to the quality I’ve come to expect. The scent is wonderful, like fresh sugar cookies, and doesn’t have that weird artificial smell you usually get with cookie, cake, or vanilla scents. Plus, the formula is non-greasy (no, really!) and very hydrating. My skin doesn’t feel tacky for hours after application like a lot of other brands. I liked it so much I bought the big bottle and it’s the only brand of lotion I will consistently apply at night and with pleasure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Moisturizer/ Lotion. Doesn’t Irritate Dry/Chapped Skin
reviews.reviewText: Hempz- Sensitive Skin 2.25 oz.-A soft relaxing scent. (Not strong. I smell a subtle hint of honey and oatmeal)-Great moisturizer/ lotion for body and hands-Soothes and softens dry or sensitive skin-Doesn't sting or irritate dry/ chapped skin-Non-greasy-Absorbs into the skin well-A creamy thick consistency. (Due to this, I sometimes need to turn the small bottle upside down and give a little shake to bring the lotion toward the top)-A great way to test new scents before purchasing the larger size-These compact-size bottles are great for on-the-go, travel, work, purse, and anywhere space is limited.And they’re super easy to refill from a larger bottle too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best lotion!
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion so much! I pick this specific one because of the oatmeal, shea butter, hemp, cocoa, and mango seed that make amazing hydration for my dry skin, especially my feet. The 2.25 oz. size is perfect for on-the-go! I keep it in my purse and car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best lotion
reviews.reviewText: The perfect purse or travel size, great smell and quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells like maple syrup and to me that is not it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant feel absorbs easily and hydrates skin. Not much scent. Bottle is small and convenient to carry in bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion. Perfect size to keep in your car or purse. Smells amazing 😍

I’m someone who is super sensitive to fragrance. I can’t even have regular shampoo or conditioner- it gives me a headache. So I generally always have to buy scent free products.After buying my partner Hempz’ hard working face cream, I tried it and loved it. I wanted something for my body and this stuff didn’t list a smell in the description so I bought it. It does have a smell... but it Smells fantastic and doesn’t give me a headache!Makes my skin feel amazing. I bought the big pump bottle for at home to apply when in bed and then I bought the mini bottle for when I’m at work! I wish I were rich because I would totally stockpile on it. I pray that they never discontinue this product
I feel like the product is good just wish it was cheaper and if it was cheaper I would buy it a lot more

reviews.reviewTitle: Purchased in the large size and gave up all other brands!!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the larger size. This smells absolutely amazing. I wasn’t sure what to expect but it’s a soft almost baked goods smell.I have since given up all other brands of lotion.I even use this on my face when my skin needs extra attention.
This Lotion is great it worked wonders on my severely dry skin. Thank you so much!
All good arrived on time great product
